× Order your favorite dishes in seconds! Order Online × Did you know we do catering? Whatever your occasion, however big or small, we have the perfect options to choose from. Cater your birthday party, holiday party, corporate events, wedding festivities and more! Catering Packages Job Listings - We're hiring! Call, email or submit an inquiry today to learn more! Parties & Groups - Host your next party or get together Book your party Parties & Groups - Host your next party or get together Menu Southern BBQ at its best. We are striving to be as local as possible with local meats, produce and beers. Our Menu Private Party Reserve our private party space, The Edisto Room Book a Party Events Local's Night Every Wednesday Half-priced prime brisket smash burgers, and local drink specials! Check Them Out Catering Place your Catering Inquiry below! Catering Gallery Reviews review by - Yelp Cal L: Outstanding on everything from music to service to beer and food . Smoked ribs were to die for! We got it on open music night and it was a blast. We are already planning to go here again. review by - Yelp Wendy R: Ribs delicious and huge. Brisket was outstanding. Wings were also very good. Nice atmosphere and quality service. Also had a great band so that added a star to the entire experience. review by - Yelp Ingrid J: GREAT BBQ...we smelled the BBQ lingering in the air that we had to stop. Thank God we did because this place has the BEST BBQ ever (and we live in Savannah)! Come by and I promise you, you will NOT BE DISAPPOINTED! review by - Yelp Emily M: Brisket is super underrated. I think they've made some changes, and I'd put their bbq up against any others in town. The smoked wings are the best I've had. Love the atmosphere, and the live music. Good vibe, and awesome outdoor seating space. review by - Yelp George D: Holy cow, that was some good BBQ. Stopped by on a whim. Everyone really enjoyed the food. Wraps, potatoes, brisket, pulled pork, ribs. The coleslaw was fanatic also. You can't go wrong. Sunday January 25th Join us Sunday, Jan. 25th in Park Circle for our 2nd Annual Barks & Bushels event, in partnership with The Charleston Animal Society. Enjoy an All-You-Can-Eat experience from 1-4pm for $35, and receive a $10 gift card to Southern Roots Smokehouse by bringing a bag of dog food to donate. Indulge in our Bloody Mary Bar, sponsored by Wheatly's Vodka. We've got live music with Dan & The Donuts for those of you just looking to unwind. All-You-Can-Eat Tickets: https://tinyurl.com/BarksBushels This is a kid and dog friendly event, so bring the entire family!
